official-title.#text: To direct the Secretary of Education to modify the FAFSA to include a space for the purpose of identifying whether a student is a foster youth, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 483(a) of the Higher Education Act of 1965

header.#text: Identification of foster youth on the FAFSA

text.#text: include a space on the forms developed under this subsection for the purpose of identifying students who are foster youth or were in the foster care system and who are seeking financial assistance under this title; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: as a foster youth or as having been in the foster care system of the student’s potential eligibility for Federal student financial aid, including postsecondary education programs through the John H. Chafee Foster Care Independence Program under

text.#text: notify each student who identifies him or herself under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: and any other Federal programs under which such student may be eligible to receive assistance.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 477 of the Social Security Act

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3915 IH: To direct the Secretary of Education to modify the FAFSA to include a space for the purpose of identifying whether a student is a foster youth, and for other purposes.
